name: VersionDotNetCoreAssemblies
description: Applies a version to a .NET Core assembly via the .csproj files based on the build number. Based on Microsoft sample from https://msdn.microsoft.com/Library/vs/alm/Build/overview
author: Black Marble

inputs.name: Path
inputs.label: Source folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Source folder for assemblies files, can be root as it will find all files recursively

inputs.name: VersionNumber
inputs.label: Version Number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Version number to apply to files, can be extracted from the build name 'Build HelloWorld_00.00.00000.0' format

inputs.name: Injectversion
inputs.label: Inject Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: If True no regex processing will be done to the build number. The build number must format must match the requirements of the 'Version Format for JSON File'

inputs.name: VersionRegex
inputs.label: Regex Filter to extract build number
inputs.helpMarkDown: Regular expression filter to get build number from the build name.

inputs.name: Field
inputs.label: The version field to update
inputs.helpMarkDown: The version field to update, if blank all version fields are updated usually <version>1.1.1.1</version>.

inputs.name: AddDefault
inputs.label: Add a Version field if missing
inputs.helpMarkDown: Adds the version field if no version field is found, and no other field name specified e.g. <version>1.1.1.1</version>.

inputs.name: OutputVersion
inputs.label: Version number used variable name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The actual version number extracted and used from the build number.
